author: Gary Larson

entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for July 19, 2024

summary.caption: “For crying out loud, I was hibernating! … Don’t you guys ever take a pulse?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for July 19, 2024

summary.caption: “And here’s the jewel of my collection, purchased for a king’s ransom from a one-eyed man in Istanbul. ... I give you—Zuzu’s petals.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for July 19, 2024

summary.caption: In medieval times, a suit of armor often served as a family’s message center.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for July 19, 2024

summary.caption: “I wouldn’t do that, Spunky—I have friends in pie places.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for July 19, 2024

summary.caption: “Egad! It’s those weird possums from across town! … Everyone fake like you’re dead.”
